languages.text: "А что поделать, {name}? Не скулить же нам теперь, что Всеотец послал нам не такую битву, какая виделась нам в сладких снах".
"Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."
languages.original_text: "А что поделать, {name}? Не скулить же нам теперь, что Всеотец послал нам не такую битву, какая виделась нам в сладких снах".

traits.locale_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

traits.locale_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

traits.locale_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

traits.locale_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

traits.locale_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

traits.locale_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: “是吗，那你说我们该怎么办，{name}？现在可不是抱怨的时候。就算我们面对的战斗与我们在美梦中看到的不一样，那也是全父的安排。”
languages.original_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."

traits.locale_text: “是吗，那你说我们该怎么办，{name}？现在可不是抱怨的时候。就算我们面对的战斗与我们在美梦中看到的不一样，那也是全父的安排。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Que pouvons-nous bien faire d'autre, {name} ? Il serait malvenu de nous plaindre que le Père de Tous nous envoie un combat différent de celui que nous avions vu en rêve. »
languages.original_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."

traits.locale_text: « Que pouvons-nous bien faire d'autre, {name} ? Il serait malvenu de nous plaindre que le Père de Tous nous envoie un combat différent de celui que nous avions vu en rêve. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「ならばどうすりゃいいんだ、{name}？淡い期待とは違う戦いに全知の父が送り込んだからといって、泣き言を言う筋合いはない」
languages.original_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."

traits.locale_text: 「ならばどうすりゃいいんだ、{name}？淡い期待とは違う戦いに全知の父が送り込んだからといって、泣き言を言う筋合いはない」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «¿Y qué quiere que le hagamos, {name}? No nos corresponde protestar si el Padre de todas las cosas nos envía a una batalla diferente a la que soñábamos».
languages.original_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué quiere que le hagamos, {name}? No nos corresponde protestar si el Padre de todas las cosas nos envía a una batalla diferente a la que soñábamos».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Nun, was sollen wir tun, {name}? Es steht uns nicht zu, zu klagen, dass der Allvater uns einen anderen Kampf zugedacht hat, als wir ihn in unseren süßen Träumen gesehen haben."
languages.original_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, was sollen wir tun, {name}? Es steht uns nicht zu, zu klagen, dass der Allvater uns einen anderen Kampf zugedacht hat, als wir ihn in unseren süßen Träumen gesehen haben."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Ne yapmamızı istersin {name}? Yücebaba bizi, tatlı rüyalarımızda gördüğümüzden başka biriyle savaşmaya gönderdi diye serzenişte bulunacak hâlimiz yok."
languages.original_text: "Well, what are we to do, {name}? 'Tis not our place to whimper that the Allfather has sent us a fight different from the one we saw in our sweet dreams."
